title: Research Topic: No Kings Movement: June 14, 2025 Mass Protests and Constitutional Resistance
summary: Based on the research priority 'No Kings Movement: June 14, 2025 Mass Protests and Constitutional Resistance', this event represents a significant development in the area described as: Document the massive 'No Kings' protests of June 14, 2025, involving over 5 million people across 2,100+ locations. Analyze as constitutional resistance movement targeting 3.5% population participatio... This event demonstrates the interconnected nature of global kleptocracy and corruption networks, involving multiple actors across jurisdictions and highlighting the need for coordinated international response.
